description:
Ever wondered why you sabotage or procrastinate?

We all do it but why?

Fears are the main reason people fail in business and this course will show you how to overcome and release the top 6 fears as mentioned in Napoleon Hills best selling book 'Think & Grow Rich'.

In this course you will release the top 6 fears that sabotage:

  1. Poverty
  2. Criticism
  3. Health
  4. Loss of love
  5. Old age
  6. Death

This course is aimed at any one who wants to be more successful in life and is real simple to follow.

Each video features demonstrations of the EFT Tapping technique which is used to release negative emotions and fears.

Students simply follow along with the instructor and with practise, your fears will fade away.

Facing your fears is not scary, you simply tap a few acupuncture points and focus the mind on letting go.

Join today, you'll be glad you did!
title: Improve Self Esteem Overcome 6 Fears That Sabotage Success
